summary: In 1863, when Americans warships approach Japan, a enigmatic ronin becomes a important figure in a complex game of power between the Shogunate and the empire.
cast: Tetsurô Tanba|Shima Iwashita|Eiji Okada|Isao Kimura|Tamotsu Hayakawa|Eitarô Ozawa|Fujio Suga|Muga Takewaki|Takanobu Hozumi|Hideo Kidokoro|Tetsuji Takechi|Gen Shimizu|Yoshindo Yamaji|Hiroshi Aoyama|Shin'ya Mizushima|Kyôko Aoi|Junkichi Orimoto|Sumio Takatsu|Minoru Hodaka|Yukio Ninagawa|Hiroshi Mizushima|Mitsuru Tateoka|Ken Amano|Takao Shigetomi|Akira Hanaue|Jun Ooi|Shôsaburô Aihara|Yasuzô Andô|Kazuya Tsuchii|Satarô Taki|Takaaki Kadota|Kazue Taki|Shin Nakahara|Kunichika Nagai|Omenosuke Ichikawa|Satoru Nishida|Kenzô Tanaka|Akio Miyajima|Ryokutarô Hanai|Shinpachi Kura|Nishimiya Kenji|Jun Kajima|Isao Shizume|Kazuo Ôkita|Minoru Miyagi|Kôzaburô Takami|Kenjirô Nakase|Muneshirô Matsumoto|Fujio Sasagawa|Yuzuru Asaoka|Seikei Takaoka|Teruo Sudô|Kenji Hayashi|Kimie Hayashi|Junko Hara|Yuki Kayama|Itoko Wakaura|Kazuko Futaba|Reiko Kawachi|Sakae Hamaoka|Fusako Suzuki|Keiji Sada|Takeshi Kusaka
title: Ansatsu
